main_definition: The state of being present or having actual physical existence.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be in the world; to have a presence or impact.
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite its small size, this unique species of frog exists only in certain remote areas.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The fact that something is not non-existent and has some form of existence.
meanings_and_examples.example: There are many unexplained phenomena that exist beyond our current understanding.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be present or available, often in the context of an event or occurrence.
meanings_and_examples.example: The concert does not exist without all its performers being on stage at the same time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In a philosophical sense, to have being or essence.
meanings_and_examples.example: Some argue that consciousness exists as an aspect of our physical existence.
